title: A new type of spectating mode
body: i would like to discuss the addition to a player perspective spectate mode, which allows the spectators to view exactly how the person they are viewing is clicking, moving and managing their gold. i think this would be a lovely addition to league because newer players can watch how pro players do things in league, in terms of their clicking so on so forth.  it would also be good for the esports side of things because when we see a replay of what just happened the shoutcasters could go to player perspective and watch what they did. i would love to see your thoughts on this! Free to Discuss, Best Veigar NA {{champion:45}}
